title: Pet Friendly House Available for Rent (3 Bed, 2 Bath)
posting_body: 3 bed, 2 bath pet friendly townhouse with finished basement available for rent in Evanston.
- A covered garage, keyless entry, smart plugs and central air that can be controlled via app.
- The kitchen is equipped with a brand new refrigerator and garbage disposal; gas stove, dishwasher, and microwave in great condition.
- In-unit washer and dryer in basement laundry room.
- Comfortable and cozy living room with large windows that capture morning sunlight.
- Tons of storage space in hallways and rooms.
- Walking distance to ETHS, Dewey Elementary School as well as Mason and Penny Parks.
Conveniently located a few blocks away from Valli Produce and accessible to public transportation.
- Next to a bike path to ride to downtown and Northwestern University (1.7 miles away)
- No breed or weight restrictions on pets (2 pets max).
- No security deposit, however, non-refundable $750 move-in and $750 move-out fees will apply along with the first month's rent.
